 => true 
ruby-1.9.2-p290 :002 > Benchmark.bm(5) do |x|
ruby-1.9.2-p290 :003 >     1.upto(30) do |n|
ruby-1.9.2-p290 :004 >       x.report("#{n}:") do
ruby-1.9.2-p290 :005 >         Regexp.new(('a?'*n)+('a'*n)) =~ ('a'*n)
